      private void setSteeringContinuous​(double FL, double FR, double BL, double BR)
      Sets the drive steering
      Parameters:
      FL - Front left translation requested. units?
      FR - Front right translation requested. units?
      BL - Back left translation requested. units?
      BR - Back right translation requested. units?

    • setDrive

      private void setDrive​(double FL, double FR, double BL, double BR)
      Drives the bot in percent control mode based on inputs
      Parameters:
      FL - driverFL requested drive (-3.5, 3.5)
      FR - driverFR requested drive (-3.5, 3.5)
      BL - driverBL requested drive (-3.5, 3.5)
      BR - driverBR requested drive (-3.5, 3.5)
